rex_interface_fund_withdraw_balance: {{balance}} {{chainSymbol}} in contract that can be withdrawn
rex_interface_fund_confirmation_modal_de: This will withdraw {{amount}} from the REX smart contract. This balance will then be available on your account for normal actions.
rex_interface_fund_confirmation_modal_fu: This will deposit {{amount}} into the REX smart contract. This balance will be removed from your account and then be able to be used for the REX exchange or the rental of resources.
rex_interface_fund_message: This is the first step no matter how you want to use REX. The {{chainSymbol}} added to your fund here will be available either rent resources or generate revenue.
rex_interface_fund_subheader: Deposit or Withdraw {{chainSymbol}} from the REX system contract.
rex_interface_manage_rex_subheader: Exchange your {{chainSymbol}} for REX tokens, which will compound as other users lease CPU and NET from the REX contract.
rex_interface_not_voting_or_proxying: You appear to not be meeting the minimum criteria to use this feature. In order to buy REX, you must first either vote for 21 block producers or proxy your votes.
rex_interface_rent_message: This interface can be used to rent some CPU or NET using the {{chainSymbol}} in your fund.
rex_not_voting_or_proxying_subheader: In order to use the REX features, your account must either be voting for a minimum of 21 block producers or proxying to a voting proxy.
rex_lend_about_header:
REX is the new EOSIO set of contracts that allow EOS token holders to earn passive income from their EOS. 

 The idea is that one can assign the EOS they have to a fund and receive REX tokens in exchange. The staking power coming from the EOS that is exchanged for REX will then be lent to users that in exchange will pay a small fee increasing the size of the fund. Because the amount of REX is finite, the result is that the EOS to REX ratio can only go up meaning that whoever lends their EOS to the fund will at least recover the entirety of those funds, but can almost always expect a return.
rex_lend_about_warning: Please note that only users that have voted for 21 block producers or delegated their voting power are allowed to use REX.
rex_rent_about_header: REX is the new EOSIO set of contracts that allow users to rent CPU and Bandwidth resources in exchange for a fee.
